properties.short description: Robert de Grandmesnil Abandons Roger II's Army
properties.description: Robert de Grandmesnil abandonded Roger II's army without permission after fearing for the loss of his supplies and funds.
properties.people:
Roger II, King
Robert de Grandmesnil, Lord
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: Countess Matilda fled Alife to join her brother, Roger II, in Salerno.
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.short description: Robert II Sailed to Pisa to Obtain Military Help
properties.description: In order to secure aid against Roger II, Robert II sailed to Pisa seeking aid from their people.
properties.people: Robert II, Prince of the Capuans
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: After the surrender of Matera, Alexander fled to Dalmatia.
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: Roger II returns home to Sicily for the winter months.
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: Rainulf II moves his army to Marigliano, a city run by an allied lord, to await the return of Prince Robert II.
properties.people:
Rainulf II, Count of Caiazzo and Alife
Robert de Medania, lord of Acerra
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.short description: Robert II Travels Back to Pisa
properties.description: Because the Pisan reinforcements had not yet arrived, Robert II traveled back to Pisa to gather the soldiers.
properties.people: Robert II, Prince of the Capuans
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: Desiring yet to fight, Ropolto fled to join forces with Sergius VII
properties.people:
Ropolto, commander of the knights of Benevento
Sergius VII, Duke of Naples
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.short description: Robert II Disengaged From Emir John
properties.description: Due to a shortage of food, Robert II retreats with his forces while leaving behind Count Rainulf to guard Aversa.
properties.people:
John, Emir
Robert II, Prince of the Capuans
Rainulf II, Count of Caiazzo and Alife
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).
